detailResultFields.label: Course Section Definition Public Notes
detailResultFields.value:
Discussions are optional. 

Registering for this section indicates that you do not want a reserved discussion seat and will self-study to make up the missed instructional time or drop-in to a scheduled discussion subject to available space.

detailResultFields.value: This is a blended learning course where 50% of the course takes place in-class and 50% online. Students must also register for CRWR 301 L1, LS2, or LS3, the lecture-seminar portion of this course.

uiLabels.WDRES.FACETEDSEARCH.SymanSyntax:
Boolean logic can be expressed using AND, OR, NOT, and (). 
Exact phrases can be surrounded by double quotation marks. 
Example: ("software engineer" OR computer science) AND ~manager~.
